examples: The garden was transformed at great expense.
El jardín se transformó a un gran costo.
No expense was spared (= they spent as much money as was needed) to make the party a success.
No se repararon en gastos (= gastaron tanto dinero como se necesitaba) para que la fiesta fuera un éxito.
He's arranged everything, no expense spared.
Lo ha arreglado todo, sin reparar en gastos.
She always travels first-class regardless of expense.
Ella siempre viaja en primera clase sin importar los gastos.
